name: PS-02-Substrate: Related Abstraction 01
description:
v4W.ENko - "PS-02-Substrate: Related Abstraction 01". The Black&White  representation of the standard "SUBSTRATE"  pattern realized in 2d. "Pattern`s standardization" series is a collection of patterns realized with standard algorithmic structures of typical 2d procedural geometry.  1600 cells / random seed 2888.  Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.

The white  micro-rectangles as little as almost some "dots" for our perception are moving according to "cycle wave" timeline along the lines generated with standard  "SUBSTRATE"  pattern. The whole visualizations is forming abstract motion image.
